languages.text: "Эту судьбу зовут Иокаста Зауэрбэк, Лорд-капитан. Она поручила мне приглядывать за капитаном Четвертого... с особыми полномочиями. Капитан оказался скомпрометирован, и я его ликвидировала, а затем вскрыла особый пакет с инструкциями на случай мятежа, организовала отряд обороны и примкнула к борьбе".

"That fortune was Mistress Sauerback, Lord Captain. She assigned me to keep an eye on the captain of Depot 4, with special powers. The captain had become compromised, so I eliminated him. I then opened a special package with instructions to follow in case of mutiny, formed a defence squad, and joined the battle."
languages.original_text: "Эту судьбу зовут Иокаста Зауэрбэк, Лорд-капитан. Она поручила мне приглядывать за капитаном Четвертого... с особыми полномочиями. Капитан оказался скомпрометирован, и я его ликвидировала, а затем вскрыла особый пакет с инструкциями на случай мятежа, организовала отряд обороны и примкнула к борьбе".

traits.locale_text: "That fortune was called Jocasta Sauerback, Lord Captain. She assigned me to keep an eye on the captain of Depot 4. with special powers. The captain was compromised, so I eliminated him, and then opened a special package with instructions in case of mutiny, formed a defence squad, and joined the battle."

I then opened a special package with instructions to follow in case of mutiny, formed a defence squad, and joined the battle."

languages.text: «Mi fortuna es la maestra Sauerback, Lord Capitán. Me asignó vigilar al capitán del depósito 4 con poderes especiales. El capitán se había vuelto en nuestra contra, de modo que lo eliminé. Después, abrí un paquete especial con instrucciones en caso de motín, formé un escuadrón de defensa y me uní a la batalla».
languages.original_text: "That fortune was Mistress Sauerback, Lord Captain. She assigned me to keep an eye on the captain of Depot 4, with special powers. The captain had become compromised, so I eliminated him. I then opened a special package with instructions to follow in case of mutiny, formed a defence squad, and joined the battle."

traits.locale_text: «Mi fortuna es la maestra Sauerback, Lord Capitán. Me asignó vigilar al capitán del depósito 4 con poderes especiales. El capitán se había vuelto en nuestra contra, de modo que lo eliminé. Después, abrí un paquete especial con instrucciones en caso de motín, formé un escuadrón de defensa y me uní a la batalla».

languages.text: 「その運命とは、ザウアーバック氏のことですよ、ロード・キャプテン。彼女は私に、特別な権限を与えて第四倉庫の中隊長を監視するように命じました。中隊長の様子が怪しくなり、私は彼を始末しました。そしていただいた小包を開いたところ、反乱が起きた場合の指示が書かれていたので、防衛隊を編成して戦闘に参加したのです」
languages.original_text: "That fortune was Mistress Sauerback, Lord Captain. She assigned me to keep an eye on the captain of Depot 4, with special powers. The captain had become compromised, so I eliminated him. I then opened a special package with instructions to follow in case of mutiny, formed a defence squad, and joined the battle."

traits.locale_text: 「その運命とは、ザウアーバック氏のことですよ、ロード・キャプテン。彼女は私に、特別な権限を与えて第四倉庫の中隊長を監視するように命じました。中隊長の様子が怪しくなり、私は彼を始末しました。そしていただいた小包を開いたところ、反乱が起きた場合の指示が書かれていたので、防衛隊を編成して戦闘に参加したのです」

languages.text: “这一切都是出于苏尔贝克女士的安排，舰长大人。她委派我监视四号货栈的上尉，那个人已经投敌了，于是我消灭了他。之后我打开了提前准备的特殊包裹，里面有针对武装叛乱的行事指南，于是我组建了一支防御部队，加入了战斗。”
languages.original_text: "That fortune was Mistress Sauerback, Lord Captain. She assigned me to keep an eye on the captain of Depot 4, with special powers. The captain had become compromised, so I eliminated him. I then opened a special package with instructions to follow in case of mutiny, formed a defence squad, and joined the battle."

traits.locale_text: “这一切都是出于苏尔贝克女士的安排，舰长大人。她委派我监视四号货栈的上尉，那个人已经投敌了，于是我消灭了他。之后我打开了提前准备的特殊包裹，里面有针对武装叛乱的行事指南，于是我组建了一支防御部队，加入了战斗。”

languages.text: "Diese glückliche Fügung war Herrin Sauerback, Lord Captain. Sie hat mir aufgetragen, den Captain von Depot 4 im Auge zu behalten, und hat mir Sonderbefugnisse gewährt. Der Captain war kompromittiert worden, also habe ich ihn eliminiert. Sodann habe ich ein Paket mit Anweisungen geöffnet, die im Falle einer Meuterei zu befolgen waren, habe einen Verteidigungstrupp gebildet und mich dem Kampf angeschlossen."
languages.original_text: "That fortune was Mistress Sauerback, Lord Captain. She assigned me to keep an eye on the captain of Depot 4, with special powers. The captain had become compromised, so I eliminated him. I then opened a special package with instructions to follow in case of mutiny, formed a defence squad, and joined the battle."

traits.locale_text: "Diese glückliche Fügung war Herrin Sauerback, Lord Captain. Sie hat mir aufgetragen, den Captain von Depot 4 im Auge zu behalten, und hat mir Sonderbefugnisse gewährt. Der Captain war kompromittiert worden, also habe ich ihn eliminiert. Sodann habe ich ein Paket mit Anweisungen geöffnet, die im Falle einer Meuterei zu befolgen waren, habe einen Verteidigungstrupp gebildet und mich dem Kampf angeschlossen."

languages.text: « Le hasard porte un nom, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : maîtresse Sauerback. Elle m'a ordonné de garder un œil sur le capitaine du dépôt 4, avec toute autorité pour intervenir si nécessaire. Comme le capitaine était compromis, je l'ai éliminé. J'ai ensuite ouvert un paquet spécial contenant des instructions en cas de mutinerie, puis j'ai formé une escouade de défense pour nous joindre aux combats. »
languages.original_text: "That fortune was Mistress Sauerback, Lord Captain. She assigned me to keep an eye on the captain of Depot 4, with special powers. The captain had become compromised, so I eliminated him. I then opened a special package with instructions to follow in case of mutiny, formed a defence squad, and joined the battle."

traits.locale_text: « Le hasard porte un nom, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : maîtresse Sauerback. Elle m'a ordonné de garder un œil sur le capitaine du dépôt 4, avec toute autorité pour intervenir si nécessaire. Comme le capitaine était compromis, je l'ai éliminé. J'ai ensuite ouvert un paquet spécial contenant des instructions en cas de mutinerie, puis j'ai formé une escouade de défense pour nous joindre aux combats. »

languages.text: "Bahsettiğiniz mucize, Sauerback Hanım'dı Lord Kaptan. 4. Depo'nun şu özel güçleri olan komutanına göz kulak olmamı istedi. Komutan yozlaşmıştı, ben de onu aradan çıkardım. Ardından isyan hâlinde takip edilecek yönergeler içeren özel bir paket açtım. Sonra da bir savunma mangası kurup mücadeleye katıldım."
languages.original_text: "That fortune was Mistress Sauerback, Lord Captain. She assigned me to keep an eye on the captain of Depot 4, with special powers. The captain had become compromised, so I eliminated him. I then opened a special package with instructions to follow in case of mutiny, formed a defence squad, and joined the battle."
